banner.apresentation: Nice to meet you, I'm Mariana,

description.text: Nice to meet you, I'm Mariana, but you can call me Mari! I'm a full-stack developer passionate about turning ideas into amazing user experiences. Over time, I've been refining my skills, always focused on delivering quality code and providing the best experience to the client. A technology enthusiast, I love sharing knowledge wherever I go, always with good music in my headphones to inspire my creations and fuel great achievements.
description.cta: Come learn a bit more about my journey!

stacks.name: code
stacks.title: Developer
stacks.description: I'm a full-stack developer, combining a solid back-end with an efficient front-end to deliver complete and functional applications.

stacks.name: palette
stacks.title: UX Enthusiast
stacks.description: My strength lies in front-end development, where I specialize in crafting impactful and intuitive applications for an engaging experience.

stacks.name: book
stacks.title: Workshops
stacks.description: Passionate about the transformative power of knowledge, I seek to share my experiences with others.

stacks.name: people
stacks.title: Society
stacks.description: I believe in the power of technology to change lives and I'm interested in initiatives that contribute to social well-being.

cta.text: Want to know more about my technical skills?
cta.cta: Download my résumé below and discover more:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If my technical and social skills caught your attention and you're ready to create innovative solutions, get in touch with me or connect through my social networks below.

project_page.description_contact: If my technical and social skills caught your attention and you're ready to create innovative solutions, get in touch with me or connect through my social media below.

projects.description_card: Full-stack application focused on women in the tech industry.
